answer:
The Runner does not access any cards. The Corp does not add any cards from Archives to HQ nor trash any cards from HQ.

Which player trashes the random cards from HQ? Does this trashing trigger effects like [Hostile Infrastructure](/en/card/06083)?
question:
####[ANCUR](https://twitter.com/anr_ruleswiki) [UFAQ 22](http://ancur.wikia.com/wiki/The_Devil_and_the_Dragon_UFAQ) [Michael Boggs]
What happens when a run initiated by Glut Cipher is successful and there are fewer than 5 cards in Archives?
